languages.text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.
languages.original_text: Мастер-тактик получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 20% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального запаса здоровья{/g}, а также число уровней Тактического преимущества, равное {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} мастера-тактика. Завершается {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g} Внутреннего стержня, Напутствия и Тактического восстановления. До конца хода мастера-тактика эти способности можно применить только к нему самому.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician suffers unpreventable Damage equal to 20% of their maximum Wounds, gains the Tactician's Resolve stacks of Tactical Advantage, and resets the cooldown of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Tactician theirself.

The Tactician suffers unpreventable Damage equal to 20% of their maximum Wounds, gains the Tactician's Resolve stacks of Tactical Advantage, and resets the cooldown of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Tactician theirself.

The Tactician suffers unpreventable damage equal to 20% of their maximum wounds, gains the Tactician's Resolve stacks of Tactical Advantage, and resets the cooldown of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Tactician themselves.

The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} stacks of tactical advantage, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

languages.text: Мастер-тактик получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 20% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального запаса здоровья{/g}, а также число уровней {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактического преимущества{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} мастера-тактика</u>. Завершается {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g} {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Внутреннего стержня{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Напутствия{/g} и {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Тактического восстановления{/g}. До конца хода мастера-тактика эти способности можно применить только к нему самому.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: Мастер-тактик получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 20% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального запаса здоровья{/g}, а также число уровней {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактического преимущества{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} мастера-тактика</u>. Завершается {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g} {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Внутреннего стержня{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Напутствия{/g} и {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Тактического восстановления{/g}. До конца хода мастера-тактика эти способности можно применить только к нему самому.

Тактик получает прямой урон, равный 20% от своего максимального запаса здоровья, а также число уровней Тактического преимущества, равное решимости тактика. Завершается период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} Внутреннего стержня, Напутствия и Тактического восстановления. До конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика эти способности можно применить только к нему самому.

languages.text: 战术专家受到相当于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}20%的{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，获得额外{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，等同于<u>战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。此外，{g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}关键战术{/g}、{g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}鼓舞人心{/g}与{g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}战术枢纽{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会被重置。在战术专家的回合结束前，上述能力只能以战术专家自身为目标使用。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家受到相当于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}20%的直击伤害，获得额外战术优势层数，等同于战术专家的决心。此外，关键战术、鼓舞人心与战术枢纽的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会被重置。在战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，上述能力只能以战术专家自身为目标使用。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}受到相当于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}20%的{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，获得额外“战术优势”层数，等同于战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。此外，关键战术、鼓舞人心与战术枢纽的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会被重置。在战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，上述{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能以战术专家自身为目标使用。

languages.text: El maestro táctico sufre tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} como el 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}, gana <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del maestro táctico</u> acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} y reinicia el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Punto de referencia{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspiración{/g} y {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Posición fortificada{/g}. Hasta el final del turno del maestro táctico, estas capacidades solamente pueden utilizarse si su objetivo es el maestro táctico.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} sufre tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} como el 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}, gana {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del maestro táctico acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica y reinicia el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de Punto de referencia, Inspiración y Posición fortificada. Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, estas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} solamente pueden utilizarse si su objetivo es el maestro táctico.

languages.text: Der Meistertaktiker erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}, der 20 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} entspricht, erlangt <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Meistertaktikers</u>-Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g} und setzt die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Herzstück{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspirieren{/g} und {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Stützpunkt{/g} zurück. Bis zum Ende des Zugs des Meistertaktikers können diese Fähigkeiten nur auf den Meistertaktiker selbst angewendet werden.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}, der 20 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} entspricht, erlangt {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Meistertaktikers-Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil und setzt die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von Herzstück, Inspirieren und Stützpunkt zurück. Bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers können diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} nur auf den Meistertaktiker selbst angewendet werden.

languages.text: Le maître tacticien subit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} égal à 20 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}, bénéficie des cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} liés à la <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du maître tacticien</u>, et réinitialise le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Pilier{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspiration{/g} et {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Bastion{/g}. Jusqu'à la fin du tour du maître tacticien, ces capacités ne peuvent cibler que le maître tacticien lui-même.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: Le Tacticien subit un nombre de points de dégâts directs égal à 20 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}, bénéficie des cumuls d'Avantage Tactique liés à la Détermination du Tacticien, et réinitialise le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de Pilier, Inspirer et Point fort. Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Tacticien, ces capacités ne peuvent cibler que le Tacticien lui-même.

languages.text: 戦略の達人その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の20%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受け、戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}分の戦術的優位のスタックを得る。さらに、急所、鼓舞、拠点の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}をリセットする。戦略の達人のターン終了まで、これらのアビリティは戦略の達人のみをターゲットにできる。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} stacks of tactical advantage, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.

traits.locale_text: 戦略の達人その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の20%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受け、戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}分の戦術的優位のスタックを得る。さらに、急所、鼓舞、拠点の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}をリセットする。戦略の達人のターン終了まで、これらのアビリティは戦略の達人のみをターゲットにできる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の20%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受け、戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}分の戦術的優位のスタックを得る。さらに、根幹、鼓舞、長所の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}をリセットする。戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は戦略の達人のみをターゲットにできる。

languages.text: Usta Taktisyen, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %20'si kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır ancak sahip olduğu {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g}</u> değeri kadar da {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi kazanır. Ayrıca {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Yıkılmaz Direk{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}İlham{/g} ve {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Direnek Noktası{/g} kabiliyetlerinin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süreleri{/g} sıfırlanır. Bu kabiliyetler, Usta Taktisyen'in turu sona erene dek yalnızca Usta Taktisyen'i hedef alabilirler.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains <u>Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:a113bd4f6b4145f7bea35ea1c0a160a1}Linchpin{/g}, {g|f:3c33178f69de4c46983635ff3838e4f5}Inspire{/g}, and {g|f:4f978989a35e4f01b7405c409c8efeb5}Strongpoint{/g}. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.
